cannot_terminate_future_lwd: Cannot terminate: employee has an approved resignation with a future last working day.

qr_disabled_for_employee: QR is disabled for this employee.
qr_scan_description: Scanning the code opens a secure URL with a token for this employee.

no_data_for_criteria: No data found for the selected criteria.
enter_hr_emails_hint: Enter HR team email addresses (one per line)
api_post_hint: The API will receive POST requests with "phone" and "message" fields.
late_threshold_hint: minutes (notify only if late by more than this)
contract_expiry_days_hint: Send notifications when contracts expire in X days (comma-separated)
required_document_types_desc: Configure which document types are enabled and which are required for employees. Required documents will show notifications if missing.

security_check_failed_delete: Security check failed while deleting department.
no_auto_membership_roles: No auto-membership roles set for this department.
no_users_with_role: No users found with this auto-membership role. Nothing to sync.

no_attendance_this_month: No attendance sessions for this month.
you_not_allowed_view: You are not allowed to view this employee.
terminated_contact_hr: Your employment has been terminated. Please contact HR for assistance.

ot_alert_desc: Overtime alert threshold per month. Dashboard will highlight employees approaching or exceeding this limit.

note_outstanding_loan: Note: Employee has outstanding loan balance of %s SAR.

set_by_hr_policy: Set by HR based on company policy.
please_log_in_view_resignations: Please log in to view your resignations.
no_resignations_submitted: You have not submitted any resignations.

hr_approver_desc: Select a specific user for HR approval. If not set, any user with HR management capability can approve at HR level.

cannot_approve_settlement_loan: Cannot approve settlement. Employee has outstanding loan balance of %s SAR. Please settle all loans with Finance department first.

cannot_pay_settlement_loan: Cannot complete final settlement payment. Employee has outstanding loan balance of %s SAR.
all_loans_must_settle: All loans must be fully settled before releasing final exit settlement payment.
cannot_pay_settlement_assets: Cannot complete final settlement payment. Employee has %d unreturned asset(s).
all_assets_must_return: All assets must be returned before releasing final exit settlement payment.
settlement_loan_warning: This employee has an outstanding loan balance of %s SAR. Settlement cannot be finalized until all loans are settled with Finance.
no_outstanding_loans_cleared: No outstanding loans. Employee cleared for settlement.
settlement_assets_warning: This employee has %d unreturned asset(s). Settlement cannot be finalized until all assets are returned.
all_assets_returned_cleared: All assets returned. Employee cleared for settlement.
no_approved_resignations: No approved resignations pending settlement. All approved resignations have been processed.
select_resignation_hint: Select an approved resignation to create a settlement.
salary_components_desc: Define salary components like allowances, deductions, and benefits.
export_center_desc: Export payroll and attendance data in various formats for external systems.
export_attendance_desc: Export attendance data including work hours, overtime, late arrivals, and absences for a date range.
export_wps_desc: Export salary data for bank transfers in Wage Protection System (WPS) format used in Saudi Arabia and UAE.
export_detailed_desc: Export comprehensive payroll data including all earnings, deductions, and net pay breakdown.
no_approved_runs_note: No approved payroll runs found. Run and approve a payroll first to enable bank transfer and detailed exports.

not_linked_employee_record: You are not linked to an employee record.

email_all_holiday: Email all employees when a holiday is added
annual_tenure_desc: Applied only to leave types marked "Annual (Tenure-based)". Uses employee hire_date or hired_at; if both missing, falls back to the type's Annual Quota.
finance_approver_leave_desc: If set, leave requests from employees with active loans will require finance approval after HR approval.
gm_leave_desc: The General Manager approves leave requests from Department Managers. This is also used for loan approvals.
hr_approvers_leave_desc: Select users who can approve leave requests at the HR stage (Level 2). Hold Ctrl/Cmd to select multiple.
send_auto_reminders: Send automatic reminders for upcoming holidays
reminders_daily_leave_desc: Reminders run daily. We’ll avoid duplicates automatically.
holidays_desc: Fridays are always excluded from business days. Add single-day or multi-day holidays below. Use "Repeats yearly" for recurring ranges (e.g., Eid, National Day).
optional_single_day: Optional; leave empty for a single-day holiday.
annual_quota_desc: Used for non-annual types or when hire date is missing.
gender_leave_hint: Maternity leave for female, Paternity for male employees.
no_perf_data: No performance data available for this period.
alert_threshold_desc: Alert when attendance commitment falls below this percentage.
calculation_mode_desc: Shift Times: compare punch vs shift start/end. Total Hours: compare total worked hours vs target.
ctrl_cmd_select_roles: Ctrl/Cmd + click to select multiple roles.
early_leave_admin_desc: Manage employee early leave requests. Approved requests do not affect salary calculations.
period_commitment_fmt: Period: %s to %s | Working Days: %d | Present: %d | Absent: %d | Late: %d | Early Leave: %d | Incomplete: %d | Break Delay: %d | No Break: %d

no_pending_approvals_now: There are no pending approvals at this time.

upload_first_document: Upload your first document using the form above.
pdf_images_max_10mb: PDF, Images, Word, Excel — max 10 MB
employee_selfservice_profile_with_tabs_f: Employee self-service profile with tabs for overview, leave, attendance, loans, resignation, settlement, and documents. Includes dark mode, multi-language, and PWA install prompt.
selfservice_clock_inout_widget_with_live: Self-service clock in/out widget with live clock, selfie capture, geofence validation, and break management.
1_default_hides_theme_chrome_for_fullscr: 1 (default) = hides theme chrome for fullscreen feel, 0 = inline
fullscreen_attendance_kiosk_with_qr_code: Fullscreen attendance kiosk with QR code scanning, selfie capture, and multi-employee support. Designed for shared devices at workplace entrances.
kiosk_device_id_default_autoselects_firs: Kiosk device ID (default: auto-selects first active kiosk)
leave_dashboard_showing_kpis_requests_co: Leave dashboard showing KPIs (requests count, available days, used days, annual balance) and recent leave requests.
resignation_submission_form_with_date_pi: Resignation submission form with date picker, type selection (regular/final exit), and notice period display.
lists_all_submitted_resignations_for_the: Lists all submitted resignations for the employee with status badges and approval tracking.
employee_loan_listing_showing_loan_id_st: Employee loan listing showing loan ID, status, principal, outstanding balance, monthly installment, and period.
deprecated_redirects_to_the_leave_tab_in: Deprecated — redirects to the leave tab in sfs_hr_my_profile.
copy_any_shortcode_below_and_paste_it_in: Copy any shortcode below and paste it into a WordPress page or post to display it on the frontend.
wordpress_core_button_classes_used_throu: WordPress core button classes used throughout the plugin.
colorcoded_status_indicators_used_for_le: Color-coded status indicators used for leave requests, assets, and general status display.
rounded_pill_badges_used_in_loans_and_re: Rounded pill badges used in Loans and Resignation modules.
wordpressstandard_notices_and_custom_ale: WordPress-standard notices and custom alert components.
warning_please_review_the_data_before_pr: Warning: Please review the data before proceeding.
information_the_system_will_be_updated_t: Information: The system will be updated tonight.
dashboard_kpi_cards_approval_cards_and_n: Dashboard KPI cards, approval cards, and navigation cards.
wordpress_widefat_striped_tables_with_re: WordPress widefat striped tables with responsive support.
search_bars_filter_dropdowns_and_action_: Search bars, filter dropdowns, and action toolbars.
wordpress_navtab_and_custom_tab_styles: WordPress nav-tab and custom tab styles.
wordpress_formtable_layout_and_custom_fo: WordPress form-table layout and custom form groups.
modal_dialogs_used_for_asset_details_app: Modal dialogs used for asset details, approvals, and confirmations.
are_you_sure_you_want_to_delete_this_rec: Are you sure you want to delete this record? This action cannot be undone.
breadcrumb_navigation_and_dashboard_link: Breadcrumb navigation and dashboard link button.
profile_completion_and_generic_progress_: Profile completion and generic progress indicators.
standard_text_sizes_and_spacing_used_acr: Standard text sizes and spacing used across the plugin.
your_hr_profile_is_not_linked: Your HR profile is not linked.

hello_this_is_a_reminder_that_you_have_d:

You have %d pending items that require action:
only_types_that_need_adding_or_updating_: Only types that need adding or updating are shown.
your_account_is_not_linked_to_an_employe: Your account is not linked to an employee record.
invalid_dates_end_date_must_be_on_or_aft: Invalid dates. End date must be on or after the start date.
you_already_have_a_pending_or_approved_r: You already have a pending or approved request overlapping these dates.
supporting_document_upload_failed_please: Supporting document upload failed. Please try again.
a_supporting_document_is_required_for_si: A supporting document is required for sick leave.
something_went_wrong_saving_your_request: Something went wrong saving your request. Please try again.
your_leave_request_has_been_submitted_su: Your leave request has been submitted successfully.
leave_empty_for_a_singleday_leave: Leave empty for a single-day leave.
your_leave_requests_will_appear_here_onc: Your leave requests will appear here once you submit one.
your_loan_requests_will_appear_here: Your loan requests will appear here.
settlement_information_will_appear_here_: Settlement information will appear here when applicable.
no_departments_found_please_create_depar: No departments found. Please create departments first in HR → Departments.
rounding_snap_worked_minutes_to_nearest_: Rounding = snap worked minutes to nearest N for payroll.
configure_the_monthly_attendance_period_: Configure the monthly attendance period used for reports and performance calculations.
starts_on_a_specific_day_each_month: starts on a specific day each month
example_if_you_choose_26_the_period_runs: Example: if you choose 26, the period runs from the 26th of one month to the 25th of the next month.
map_each_department_to_a_sdefault_shifts: Map each Department to a %sDefault Shift%s. Optional date-range override (e.g., Ramadan). If no explicit Assignment exists, punches use this mapping.
select_departments_to_apply_this_templat: Select departments to apply this template to:
define_rules_to_automatically_assign_shi: Define rules to automatically assign shifts to employees based on their attributes. Rules are evaluated in priority order (lowest number first).
apply_automatically_when_new_employee_is: Apply automatically when new employee is created
title: Title:
this_will_apply_rules_to_all_employees_w: This will apply rules to all employees who do not have a default shift assigned. Continue?
apply_rules_to_employees_who_do_not_have: Apply rules to employees who do not have a default shift assigned yet.
no_departments_defined_please_create_dep: No departments defined. Please create departments first.
select_one_or_more_departments_this_shif: Select one or more departments this shift applies to. Employees in any selected department can use this shift.
click_on_the_map_to_set_location_drag_ma: Click on the map to set location. Drag marker to adjust.
set_break_start_time_to_calculate_break_: Set break start time to calculate break delay. Break end = start + unpaid minutes.
set_0_to_compute_ot_as_any_minutes_above: Set 0 to compute OT as any minutes above scheduled duration.
override_startend_times_per_day_or_mark_: Override start/end times per day, or mark days off. Leave blank to use the shift defaults above.
configure_attendance_rules_for_employees: Configure attendance rules for employees on this shift. Leave as "Default" to use system defaults.
leave_unchecked_to_use_role_policy_defau: Leave unchecked to use role policy defaults.
coordinates_are_always_logged_regardless: Coordinates are always logged regardless of enforcement setting.
assign_a_shift_over_a_date_range_eg_rama: Assign a shift over a date range (e.g., Ramadan). Shifts carry location/geofence and rules.
enable_qr_scanning_for_this_kiosk: Enable QR scanning for this kiosk
configure_typical_times_for_each_action_: Configure typical times for each action. The kiosk will highlight actions when current time is within ±30 minutes of these times.
leave_blank_to_disable_highlighting_for_: Leave blank to disable highlighting for that action. Times use 24-hour format.
rebuild_all_sessions_for_this_period_thi: Rebuild all sessions for this period? This may take a moment.
no_sessions_found_for_this_selection: No sessions found for this selection.
autocreated_employee_worked_d_minutes_le: Auto-created: employee worked %d minutes less than required hours.
autocreated_employee_left_d_minutes_befo: Auto-created: employee left %d minutes before shift end.
autorejected_no_action_was_taken_within_: Auto-rejected: no action was taken within 3 days.

you_do_not_have_permission_to_view_this: You do not have permission to view this.
all_documents_are_up_to_date: All documents are up to date

you_do_not_have_permission_to_request_do: You do not have permission to request document updates.
you_do_not_have_permission_to_send_docum: You do not have permission to send document reminders.

sick_short_is_limited_to_29_business_day: Sick (Short) is limited to 29 business days.
sick_long_requires_at_least_30_business_: Sick (Long) requires at least 30 business days.
maternity_leave_can_be_up_to_100_calenda: Maternity leave can be up to 100 calendar days (last 30 unpaid).

you_can_only_adjust_leaves_for_your_depa: You can only adjust leaves for your department.

your_leave_was_shortened_new_period_s_s_: Your leave was shortened. New period: %s → %s (%d days).

absences_d_days_please_ensure_regular_at: Absences (%d days): Please ensure regular attendance. If you need to take a day off, submit a leave request in advance.
late_arrivals_d_times_try_to_arrive_on_t: Late arrivals (%d times): Try to arrive on time for your scheduled shift. Punctuality directly impacts your commitment score.

incomplete_days_d_ensure_you_clock_both_: Incomplete days (%d): Ensure you clock both in and out to avoid incomplete records.

missed_breaks_d_times_remember_to_record: Missed breaks (%d times): Remember to record your break — unrecorded breaks are automatically deducted.
dear_s_thank_you_for_your_outstanding_co:
Dear %s,

Thank you for your outstanding commitment this period! Your attendance commitment is %.1f%%, which is excellent.

Your dedication and discipline set a great example for the team. Keep up the fantastic work — we truly appreciate your efforts.
dear_s_thank_you_for_your_good_commitmen:
Dear %s,

Thank you for your good commitment this period — your attendance commitment is %.1f%%.

You are very close to achieving an excellent rating! A small improvement in the areas below can help you reach the top. We believe you can do it.
dear_s_please_find_below_your_attendance:
Dear %s,

Please find below your attendance commitment report for this period. Your commitment is %.1f%%.

We would like to encourage you to focus on improving the following areas. Every day counts, and consistent attendance has a direct positive impact on your performance record and career growth.
_if_you_are_facing_any_challenges_please: If you are facing any challenges, please don't hesitate to reach out to your manager or HR. We are here to support you.
